resources.string: ML Kit Digital Ink Recognition Demo
ML Kit Digital Ink Recognition Demo

This app supports the following gesture commands.

1. Check Off: Draw a checkmark and then select an item.

2. Remove item: Draw a cross, then select an item.

3. Add: Draw a square to write out your new To-Do.

4. Undo: Draw a 'U' to undo the last action.


 Note: This app supports gestures anywhere on the screen. However, they must be single stroke gestures.
